text: Rebecca Kimitch is an American journalist. She won a 2015 Pulitzer Prize for Local Reporting. She studied at Northwestern University. She worked for the Daily Breeze, Los Angeles News Group, and Metropolitan Water District of Southern California. == References == ==Other websites == *A late-night chat with a Pulitzer Prize winner Tico Times, April 22, 2015 Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:American journalists Category:Pulitzer Prize winners
title: Rebecca Kimitch
